title: .NET Official Repositories
body:
Official .NET repositories collection:

- Main .NET: https://github.com/dotnet/core (releases, docs, announcements)
- Runtime: https://github.com/dotnet/runtime
- ASP.NET Core: https://github.com/dotnet/aspnetcore
- Entity Framework: https://github.com/dotnet/efcore
- C# Language: https://github.com/dotnet/csharplang

These are the official Microsoft repositories containing source code, documentation, and issue tracking for the .NET ecosystem.
